org.apache.lucene.spatial.spatial4j.geo3d

Interface GeoDistanceShape

  • All Superinterfaces:
    GeoDistance, GeoMembershipShape, GeoShape, Membership
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GeoCircle, GeoPath

    public interface GeoDistanceShape
extends GeoMembershipShape, GeoDistance
    Distance shapes have capabilities of both geohashing and distance computation (which also includes point membership determination).
    WARNING: This API is experimental and might change in incompatible ways in the next release.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface org.apache.lucene.spatial.spatial4j.geo3d.GeoShape

        equals, getBounds, getEdgePoints, intersects

      • Methods inherited from interface org.apache.lucene.spatial.spatial4j.geo3d.Membership

        isWithin, isWithin

      • Methods inherited from interface org.apache.lucene.spatial.spatial4j.geo3d.GeoDistance

        computeArcDistance, computeLinearDistance, computeLinearDistance, computeNormalDistance, computeNormalDistance, computeSquaredLinearDistance, computeSquaredLinearDistance, computeSquaredNormalDistance, computeSquaredNormalDistance
